## BeeRequestOptions type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type BeeRequestOptions = {
    baseURL?: string;
    timeout?: number;
    headers?: Record<string, string>;
    onRequest?: (request: BeeRequest) => void;
    httpAgent?: unknown;
    httpsAgent?: unknown;
    endlesslyRetry?: boolean;
};
```
